response.overview: Gina Lynn has a strong suspicion that her husband is cheating on her. She has no 'real' proof, but is angry and hurt anyway. If she were just more like her sexually deviant sister she could teach a lesson to her husband that he would never forget. Her shrink suggest she do just that. . . find someone she's attracted to and have an affair herself! After she has a roll with her neighbor who she's had a crush on, she does a dance of seduction for her therapist that even her sister would be jealous of. Back at the doctor's office, we find that the session is over. . . but. . . what? Who? Who is the therapist and who is the patient? Who really has the Inner Vision?
response.title: Inner Vision
